desc: Hit the enemy with your normal strength
Charge at the enemy more fiercely
Avoid getting hurt. Works half of the time.
Pick an item to use. After usage of item, skips your turn.
Goblin's attack. Ambush and claw the opponent dealing 100 HP.
Bandit's attack. Swiftly stab the opponent dealing 125 HP.
Ogre's attack. Punch the enemy hard for 175 HP.
Ice Dragon's attack. Summons an avalanche of icicles onto the opponent for 700 HP. (If Shriveled Pepper is consumed, this attack deals 1,050 HP for the remainder of the round.)
Staff of Flames ability. Summons a tornado of fire to the enemy. Deals 800 HP.
